Package shapes

Interface Shape

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Circle, Rectangle, Square
    interface Shape
    This is the shape interface, it is the basis for our other square and triangle class.

    It is not declared as public to ensure that it can only be accessed by package members.

    It includes several methods that will be used in the shapes that implement it.

    Author:
    Dalton

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double pi
      Constant representation of Pi for use in circle class

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void compareArea​(Shape rhs)
      Compares two shapes, outputting the higher area.
      void comparePerimeter​(Shape rhs)
      Compares two shapes, outputting the higher perimeter.
      double getArea()
      This getter function is responsible for retrieving the area of the given shape.
      double getPerimeter()
      This getter function is responsible for retrieving the perimeter of the given shape.
      java.lang.String getType()
      This function returns the type of shape the particular object is.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Overloads default toString method, allowing shape to be printed directly

    • Field Detail

      • pi

        static final double pi
        Constant representation of Pi for use in circle class

        pi = 3.1415

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • getPerimeter

        double getPerimeter()
        This getter function is responsible for retrieving the perimeter of the given shape.
        Returns:
        The double representation of the perimeter.

      • getArea

        double getArea()
        This getter function is responsible for retrieving the area of the given shape.
        Returns:
        The double representation of the area.

      • getType

        java.lang.String getType()
        This function returns the type of shape the particular object is.

        Ex: "Circle" will be returned for the Circle class, "Square" for Square, etc.

        Returns:
        A string representation of the type of shape the object is

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Overloads default toString method, allowing shape to be printed directly
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String representation of a shape

      • compareArea

        void compareArea​(Shape rhs)
        Compares two shapes, outputting the higher area.
        Parameters:
        rhs - Shape object being compared to.

      • comparePerimeter

        void comparePerimeter​(Shape rhs)
        Compares two shapes, outputting the higher perimeter.
        Parameters:
        rhs - Shape object being compared to.
